title: PBE - Something went wrong
body: i have submit a ticked for joining the pbe long time ago and when i enter to see if i am accepted it just says something went wrong , this was happening since one week so i just want to know what is the problem and how to fix it

replies.body:
I've seen this issue a few times in the past. The common solution has been to log in to your EUW account from the [Region's home page](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/). You'll then want to visit the [EUW PBE signup page](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) and click **I want to help!**.

Let me know if this fixes it for you.
i press i want help but say something went wrong please help me to fix it
